import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../JSXaux/Footer" import axios from 'axios'; import io from 'socket.io-client' export default class Ingame extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const partyId = this.props.match.params.id; console.log(partyId) const socket = io('http://localhost:7001/') this.state = { token, partyId, socket } } componentDidMount(){ console.log(this.state.partyId) this.state.emit } render() { if (!this.state.token){ return () } return (
